actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to supplement retirement benefits for State and local law enforcement officers and firefighters.

summary.text: Requires the Civil Service Commission to pay retired State and local law enforcement officers and firefighters supplemental retirement benefits equal to 25 percent of their qualifying State and local retirement benefits. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 8361-3)

titles.title: A bill to supplement retirement benefits for State and local law enforcement officers and firefighters.
